Suniel Shetty shared this image. (courtesy suniel.shetty) Highlights

  • The actor has accused the makers of sharing a fake poster

articles.description: Justice GS Patel allowed re-release of the film on Amazon after the producers of the film submitted that they have deleted the image of actor Sakshi Malik who filed defamation suit against them
